mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(m_id, m_name, m_password, m_addr, m_email, role, m_pno, birth, regdate, del, dept_d_id) VALUES(#{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{m_password}, #{m_addr}, #{m_email}, #{role}, #{m_pno}, #{birth}, NOW(), 0, #{dept_d_id});
mapper.select: SELECT m.m_id,m.m_password, m.m_name, m.m_addr, m.m_email, m.m_pno, m.birth, m.regdate, d.d_id AS dept_d_id, d.team FROM member m JOIN dept d ON m.dept_d_id = d.d_id WHERE del = 0 ORDER BY m.m_id ASC;

SELECT m.m_id,m.m_password, m.m_name, m.m_addr, m.m_email, m.m_pno, m.birth, m.regdate, d.d_id AS dept_d_id, d.team FROM member m JOIN dept d ON m.dept_d_id = d.d_id WHERE m.m_id = #{m_id} AND m.del = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET del = 1 WHERE m_id = #{m_id};
